concept.description: Enriches the information about allowed dependencies between technical layers.
concept.cypher: WITH [ ["Infrastructure", "Interface"], ["Infrastructure", "Application"], ["Infrastructure", "Domain"], ["Interface", "Application"], ["Interface", "Domain"], ["Application", "Domain"] ] AS allowedDependencies UNWIND allowedDependencies AS allowedDependency MATCH (dependentLayer:DDD:Layer{name: allowedDependency[0]}), (dependencyLayer:DDD:Layer{name: allowedDependency[1]}) MERGE (dependentLayer)-[:DEFINES_DEPENDENCY]->(dependencyLayer) RETURN dependentLayer.name, dependencyLayer.name

constraint.description: Checks that only allowed dependencies between Layers are implemented.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (dependentLayer:DDD:Layer)-[:DEPENDS_ON]->(dependencyLayer:DDD:Layer) WHERE dependentLayer <> dependencyLayer AND NOT EXISTS((dependentLayer)-[:DEFINES_DEPENDENCY]->(dependencyLayer)) RETURN dependentLayer.name AS DependentLayer, dependencyLayer.name AS Dependency ORDER BY DependentLayer, Dependency
